last_comment: Testing at the cubicle lab is as stealthy as the information related to who the licensed medical staff will be and almost as stealthy as the Covid virus itself.

OXO5RWIIMIG3Q2RMTVO5BEJPAE.body: when you run a small outfit that does less than $75M a year and you've been shuttered since early March why is it so difficult to prepare and file ONE quarter's financials? I mean the entire outfit has been shut down March -April-May-June and they cannot get the quarterly 10Q complete before the extended deadline? when you read someone say this is a quality outfit, keep that FACT in mind. WE'RE AWAITNG THE BEGINNINGS OF Q2 REPORTS FROM LEGITIMATE COMPANIES AND THESE BOZOS HAVEN'T FILED Q1 YET

JOHTXH7745EJNYXA6YAXILYESI.body: All the Dummy talking about airport Covid-19 Check up. This service is for Employees who working into the Airport. Not for the air traveller. Don't Panic. There's no Profit yet.

S6N7WBZB5GXF36RWHBEYGCTSRQ.body: I'm stymied by the negative and seemingly bitter, negligent and maligning comments being posted by "Denny" and "Gloria". Seems like more to their story. In the real world, looks like Xspa with new management and financing has been able to come up with a brilliant new format. I checked out the facility yesterday when I flew into JFK. Looked pretty busy. I was fortunate to speak w/ the doctor in charge of the testing center. Unfortunately, I was unable to be tested as they were only testing airport employees at the time. Pretty impressive all around. Not sure who Denny and Gloria are and why they are so worked up about the success of Xspa. I'm staying long. MOVE ON "GLORIA.". MOVE ON "DENNY"!!!!!

AD6V5SWNQ532X3DXTZB5YJGHNQ.body: Any idea who’s test are going to be used ?

XE4WXXRPOO3DOTBKRDWUYDWAFE.body:
As with many of you, I had higher expectations for this morning in the green rather than red after the Time article. I guess Time isn't considered a financial news source. Nonetheless confirmation will come for those readers and for many of us when XSPA opens the doors at JFK and starts testing sometime in the next several days. The base at $4.70 and support was hopefully just sell down with the overall market drop today by weak hands. Further news on JFK's actual opening, Newark, Chicago, Vegas and Atlanta will come. All of it won't come over night but it at least seems inevitable and that alone may be worth the ride.

I figure I/we have suffered through the worst of it and the R/S, and now with a little more patience, we should see some further upside, I would think at least back to the pre-RS level and hopefully beyond that.

I want to hear they use/or partner with DECN or AYTU for testing...

Time will tell but that time grows closer...

ZHFTYUE2C4K6V2FRFBEHLXAKJI.body: What's the reason for the drop today? Anything in particular?

DTMSOCK3XFJWVAIPZTMFWEFBQI.body: So the question for me after reading TIME is what company would they possibly partner with for the antibodies test

VYDUW33EY2LQFHTV4P2KNWYSNE.body: Thanks again rich. I’ll look for that $2.70  close on Monday and buy on the decline to accumulate. You were dead on today with your $2.90 prediction, so you are definitely a reliable source!! What’s are your thoughts on Tuesday? Take your $100 loss and move on.

NL6NCUUMDHVBBCVDVLNZG5O4LI.body: Just got a hot tip from (http://stocktip.xyz)

OEAZKPEHGT72XDDFI7FNE2APIU.body: It would have to drop to .01 for me sell

6YEAKUVROHATDP5ZA3J5QQS6ME.body: I got out with a small loss before it crashed. The longs are now longer. They have no choice now or they lose a lot more. So naturally now they want to stay positive and shoot down any negative #$%$ people have to say. I finally took the negative here and seen what was happening and got the hell out. Now i am just here watching this #$%$ crash.

6YVMTGHNJRK7PVWP7HE4RR5RDA.body: UNDERSTAND they are a Mobil testing unit .... Prisons ... schools ... airports ... police stations .. xprescheck

NKFVHNGAXVNPMMLX7ZGC6VBBWE.body: Does anyone on this message board know if XpresSpa did any testing at JFK this week? If not,they have just 2 days to fulfill their promise of testing begins last week of July....we should all give it our best guess and see who is closest....my over-under guess is August 15.....anybody else care to provide their best guess....

SPZPJP6BOVQ6WLBVV2QIJGRCPA.body: Glad I got out with minimal loss at 5.20. It was all hype I guess. How could spa company scan for covid? They have no medical training nothing. Scanning is for medical professionals.
